pr_title: Add a Toggle to the Status Bars w/ a Delay to show only in Combat

timeline.bodyText: This should mention that 0 will mean bars are always shown

timeline.bodyText: Game ticks would be a better unit of measurement since that's the unit of time this change actually operates on. That would also let you drop the Instant.now() duration comparisons in favor of using client.getTickCount().
